name: Tower Defense Simulator
description: A strategy game where you team up with friends to defend against endless waves of zombies and menacing bosses.

name: Brawl Stars
description: Frenetic multiplayer battles. Unlock brawlers, rank up, and remember to always blame your randoms!

name: Undertale
description: Undertale is an indie video game created by Toby Fox where you control a boy named Frisk who falls into the Underground, a world inhabited by monsters. Fight or Spare, but remembre, your choices affect the story, the characters, and even the ending of the game.

name: Minecraft
description: Explore, mine and craft! In this amazing journey where the only limit is your imagination.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: The story of three criminals that risk everything in a series of robberies in Los Santos City.

name: Super Mario 64
description: The game that defined the 3D platforming genre.

name: Deltarune
description: The direct sequel of Undertale. Play as Kris in a brand new adventure, where you and Susie fall into a dark world and must complete a mission to restore balance. It features turn-based team combat, familiar characters with new roles, and a larger, more mysterious story told in chapters.

name: Enter the Gungeon
description: Step inside the gungeon to unleash it's secrets, and get the Bullet That Can Kill the Past and save your time-line.

name: Terraria: Calamity
description: Step 1: Fell a tree, Step 2: Kill a Nameless Deity, in this extension of the original game where your only goal is defeat the ancient deities that ruled the world and save Terraria.

name: Cuphead
description: A challenging action game with art inspired by 1930s cartoons. Don't deal with the Devil!

name: God of War: Ragnraok
description: Kratos y su hijo Atreus viajan por los reinos de la mitología nórdica.

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: Defend your lawn from a zombie invasion using an arsenal of mutant plants. Addictive strategy with endless fun.

name: Hollow Knight
description: Forge your own path in Hallownest, a ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Beautiful art and brutal difficulty.

name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: The highly anticipated sequel. Play as Hornet, the protective princess, and ascend through the realm of Pharloom to escape and reveal the sadic thruth of it.

name: Super Mario Galaxy
description: Play as Mario in a brand new intergalactic adventure, to not only save the Princess Peach form the claws of Bowser, but also the universe!
